data.name: The Alien Cube - Behind the scenes
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks a folder inside the game location that contains:

  • Behind the scenes.
  • Screenshots of under development builds of The Alien Cube compared to the final version.
  • Under-development video.
  • Wallpapers.

To access the DLC:
Right click the game in your Steam Library -> Manage -> Browse Local Files

Thank you for supporting the developer!
data.about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks a folder inside the game location that contains:

To access the DLC:

Thank you for supporting the developer!
data.short_description: This DLC is meant as a support for the developer. It will unlock some bonus content.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, French, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 2GB/AMD RX 560 2GB

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
